summary: Found root cause: displayTask derived state excluded completing from fallback states
Fixed by adding completing to the list of states that show lastCompletedTask

suggestedTasks.title: Add ready-for-review to displayTask fallback states
suggestedTasks.description: The displayTask derived state may also need to include ready-for-review state for consistency, as the task info should be visible during review as well.
suggestedTasks.reason: Similar pattern noticed while fixing completing state

patterns: displayTask derived state on line 2663 controls task visibility in header
gotchas: Session state transitions can cause task info to disappear if not included in displayTask fallback conditions
